caption:
This one’s personal...
It’s more than just a product, it’s part of my story.
Rooted in where I come from, and shaped by where I’m going.
Old memories became design fuel.
What once were souvenirs now live on as symbols.

JOIN US ON THE JOURNEY 
SPENCER BADU x HOKA 
explores themes of identity, heritage and movement bringing a deeply personal narrative to the collaboration. 
OUT ON MAY 16th
